sentences.sContent: In the past 300 years, no earthquake nearly that large — nothing larger than magnitude-eight — had struck in the Japan subduction zone.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the past 300 years, no earthquake nearly that large — nothing larger than magnitude-eight — had struck in the Japan subduction zone.
sentences.sCn: 在过去的300年里，在日本俯冲地区，从没发生过一个如此巨大的地震-没有一次比八级还大。

trans.tranCn: [地]潜没(指地壳的板块沉到另一板块之下)
